name: BerryBonanza
0:
”Alexa, open berry bonanza”
”start berry buzz”
”teach me about berries”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: berry bonanza
des: Have you ever considered yourself a lover of berries and wanted to know more about them? Whether you are a passionate berry chef or just want to know more about the berries you love, this skill is able to provide people of all ages with something to chew on. With an in-built dictionary, anyone can use the skill to learn more about their favorite berries or find something new through the Berry Book. If a game is more up your alley, you can invoke the skill to play the Berry Buzz game, which will test your knowledge on how well you truly know your berries. Regardless of what you use it for, Berry Bonanza has something for everyone with fun berry facts that will guarantee a delicious experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
